title: Calculate Stride's (ticker: LRN) EV/Operating Income multiple for fiscal year 2025 using their latest 10-K filing. Assume share price = $130 and F/D S/O = 50 million. Show answer as a number (multiple) rounded to 1 decimal.
description:
1) Record FY2025 operating income (located in Income statement): 
 Income from operations = $360.094 million.
 
 2) Record net debt components for FY2025 from the same 10‑K (located in Balance Sheet): 
 Total debt = $416.322 million, 
 Current portion of finance lease liablity = $42.316 million, 
 Long-term finance lease liability = $44.567 million; 
 Cash and cash equivalents = $782.497 million, 
 Marketable Securities = $202.769 million.
 
 3) Compute enterprise valueusing inputs for equity value (as stated in promt): 
 Equity value = $130 × 50,000,000 = $6,500,000,000; 
 EV = $6,500,000,000 + $416,322,000 + $42,316,000 + $44,567,000 − $782,497,000 - $202,769,000= $6,017,939,000. [Debt and cash from Form 10‑K, FY2025].
 
 4) Compute EV/Operating Income: 
 $6,017,939,000 ÷ $360,094,000 = 16.7x.

rubric.criteria: Income from operations (located in Income Statement)= $360.094 million.
Long-term debt (located in Balance Sheet)= $416.322 million.
Current portion of finance lease liability (located in Balance Sheet) = $42.316 million.
Long-term finance lease liability (located in Balance Sheet) = $44.567 million.
Cash and cash equivalents (located in Balance Sheet) = $782.497 million.
Marketable Securities (located in Balance Sheet) = $202.769 million.
Equity value (Using stated in the promt assumptions) = Share Price × F/D/S/O = $130 × 50,000,000 = $6,500,000,000.

Enterprise value (EV) = Market Cap + Long-term debt + Current portion of finance lease liability + Long-term finance lease liability - Cash and cash equivalents - Marketable Securities = $6,017,939,000.
